revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The gardeners dictionary. Containing the methods of cultivating and improving all sorts of trees, plants, and flowers, for the kitchen, fruit, and pleasure gardens;..."
revision.text: Possibly: The gardeners dictionary. Containing the methods of cultivating and improving all sorts of trees, plants, and flowers, for the kitchen, fruit, and pleasure gardens; as also those which are used in medicine. ... Abridged from the last folio edition, by the author, Philip Miller ... In three volumes. (London : Printed for the author; and sold by John and James Rivington, 1754) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/778721622
